data.eml:eml: Four new species of mealybug (Pseudococcidae) and a new species of soft scale (Coccidae: Coccoidea: Hemiptera) from Greenland and redescriptions of a mealybug and a soft scale from Arctic Canada

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gertsson, Carl-Axel, Hodgson, Chris (2005): Four new species of mealybug (Pseudococcidae) and a new species of soft scale (Coccidae: Coccoidea: Hemiptera) from Greenland and redescriptions of a mealybug and a soft scale from Arctic Canada. Zootaxa 897: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170943
